page.title: 04CALLINGTON ADULT EDUCATION
page.content: The{county agricultural centre}at Callington School provides training in agricultural subjects. At the {comprehensive school}a wide range of courses for evening study, including art, cookery, typing, computers, word processors, navigation, music, Yoga, spinning, English and Maths. Training in bee keeping and a course on the use of a greenhouse are held at the {primary school.}Courses organised by the{Caradon Adult Education Centre} cover two to ten_week terms in the autumn and spring. Classes are held on Tuesday and Thursday evenings from 7pm to 9pm.Fees are 75p per hour, with reduced rates for pensioners, unemployed and disabled persons.
